page.title: 18 Tennis and Cricket Clubs
page.content: Gt.Missenden Tennis Club has been running for eighty years. It has roughly 450 members catering for all ages. The Club is open all week until dark. There are seven grass courts and seven weatherproof hard courts. A groundsman and a coach are employed full-time. The Club has produced several County players and two Prime- Ministers have played there in recent years. Little Kingshill Cricket Club has 30 members who play about 60 matches a season. A full-time groundsman is employed as the Club has a large ground. They are not involved in a league but play in a cup competition; also there are friendly and charity matches. Gt.Missenden Cricket Club run two teams who play neighbouring sides on Saturdays and Sundays.
